positive_examples: This is an example of linear system.
The linear system demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed linear system in this context.
A typical case of linear system would involve these features.
The concept of linear system applies here.
A dynamical system where the evolution equations are linear functions of the state variables.
negative_examples: This is an example of multi stable system, not linear system.
This represents dynamical system in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: MultiStableSystem, or other types of DynamicalSystem

definition: A dynamical system whose behavior satisfies the superposition principle.
